title: Bill Maher Will Interview Milo Yiannopoulos This Week on Real Time

text:
Bill Maher Will Interview Milo Yiannopoulos This Week on Real Time by Ken Meyer | 12:58   
More than two weeks after his speech at UC Berkeley was protested against and subsequently cancelled , Milo Yiannopoulos will appear on Friday as a guest on Real Time With Bill Maher . 
Yiannopoulos, an editor for Breitbart, has been a major news focus in recent days ever since rioters and protesters thwarted his appearance at the California university last month. As a conservative provocateur, Yiannopoulos has gained followers and enemies with his speeches against subjects like Islam, political correctness, and feminism. 
Actress Leah Remini will follow Yiannopoulos as Friday’s mid-show guest, and Maher’s panel will include comedian Larry Wilmore, Intercept Editor-in-Chief Jeremy Scahill , and former Republican congressman and President Trump supporter Jack Kingston . 
[image via screengrab]
